entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [8.0] Long Running Test: System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskPropertiesTests.TaskIDTest #91907
  • Linux Mono DsaNotDirectlySupported Rfc3279DerSequence failed to sign #91898
  • Missing repo infra docs for UseCompilerGeneratedDocXmlFile #91897
  • JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_21761 failing in GC stress #91894
    9.0.0
  • The "ConvertDllsToWebCil" task failed: System.NotImplementedException on s390x #91893
  • Process.StandardOutput.Peek() hangs when StandardOutput contains no data. #91891
  • Provide overloads for Enumerable.ToArray/ToList/ToHashSet for the initial capacity #91888
  • ilc crash while compiling System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Roslyn tests #91885
    9.0.0
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: Error IL1012: IL Trimmer has encountered an unexpected error #91880
  • IOException inside HostBuilder #91879
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json cannot deserialize to IReadOnlySet #91875
    9.0.0
  • [infra] Update the pipeline to run apple mobile library tests with Native AOT #91872
    9.0.0
  • [infra] Implement XHarness test discovery/running without the XunitFrontController #91871
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: HttpClientHandler.Credentials should support Bearer auth type #91867
  • createdump segfaults on RHEL8 arm64 with .NET 8 #91864
  • Assertion failed '!node->OperIs(GT_CALL) || (node->AsCall()->gtCallType == CT_HELPER)' during 'Optimize index checks' #91862
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Cng.Tests.DSACngPkcs8Tests.NoPlaintextExportAllowsEncryptedPkcs8(algorithm: TripleDes3KeyPkcs12) #91860
    Future

Closed

  • How do I get a COM object in Runsimpersonated? #79900
  • Port System.Net documentation for .NET 8.0 APIs #88569
    8.0.0
  • runtimelab yml no longer works as template for experiment branches #76866
  • New "an operation is not legal in the current state" failures from Type.GetType #90415
  • Empty .Net Core Runtime install folder is enough to break applications. #91806
  • Local GC, GCHeap::Alloc never called #91857
  • Assertion failed '!"Write to unaliased local overlaps outstanding read"' during 'Rationalize IR' #91855
    9.0.0
  • Publishing Blazor WebAssembly With AOT results in a broken app #83466
    8.0.0
  • LINQ should have a PartitionTo operator #91890
  • [LINQ] Combine Where and ToList() statement #91889
  • HttpClient: Alt-Svc response header has partial value. #91868
    9.0.0
  • a question about CS1686 #91861
  • Config generator wrongly emits init-related exception in bind operations #90974
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!"Duplicate gtTreeID was found"' during 'Importation' #91796
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: update ICustomQueryInterface signature to take the guid by in, not ref #91858
  • [wasi] wasm trap: out of bounds memory access in sgen_gray_object_queue_trim_free_list #88501
    Future
  • Behavior difference in JsonSerializer between .NET7 and .NET8 p4 #86419
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Provide generic version of JsonSerializable attribute #91869
  • [Mono][WASM][Test] JIT/SIMD/Vector3Interop_r/Vector3Interop_r.sh failures #46174
    9.0.0
  • Remove support for `--used-attrs-only` in illink #90793
    9.0.0
  • Inconsistency when combining `file:` URIs #85229
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'isValidVectorElemsizeFloat(size)' during 'Generate code' #91214
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Collections.Concurrent.Tests.ConcurrentQueueTests.ManyConcurrentAddsTakesPeeks_ForceContentionWithOtherThreadsPeeking "Inconsistent LargeStruct: 1 1 1 1 1 1 0 0" #91732
    8.0.0
  • Add Support for Dynamic OpenSSL Engines #37383
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Replace IlcTrimMetadata on test projects #71506
    Future
  • Multiple IL2049 warnings when publishing with NativeAOT and _AggressiveAttributeTrimming #88994
    Future
  • Stack buffer overrun- stack cookie check leading to crash in .net6.0 application #91665
  • Investigate: can we improve docs or diagnostics when 64 bit .NET Core app fails on Azure App Service #10671
    Future
  • Better diagnostics for fail-fast conditions #10812
    Future
  • E_PDB_FORMAT from SymBinder::GetReaderForFile #11070
    Future
  • [Linux/ARM] FEATURE_INTEROP_DEBUGGING status #12049
    Future
  • Put xunit nocolor under a switch #11105
    Future
  • CI failures: Unable to access upstream artifacts area /jenkins/jobs/dotnet_coreclr/jobs/master/jobs/..... #11111
    Future
  • IBCMerge is 32-bit-only and can OOM, failing builds #11183
    Future
  • Docker Git Clone command should retry on server hangup #11286
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove ObjRefInitBlk (has a GC hole) #91906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [System.HashCode] Adjust nullable annotation on generic Add method which accepts IEqualityComparer #91905
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] regArg dependcies unrolling in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs() #91904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Light up BitArray APIs with Vector512 code path #91903
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [GC] Put m_Array/m_EndArray in m_FillPointers #91902
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Merge CoreMangLib, Exceptions and Interop folders #91901
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Skip duplicate --info output if it is known SDK output #91900
    area-Host
  • Make src gen for property setters consistent with reflection #91899
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • #ifdef out code that requires FEATURE_EVENT_TRACE #91895
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimise long multiply + add/sub/neg on arm64. #91886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove Latin1CharSearchValues #91884
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [iOS] Fix trimming warnings in HttpClientHandler.AnyMobile #91877
    area-System.Net.Http, os-android, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst, 8.0.0
  • Improve the trim incompatibility message for Assembly.GetType #91876
    area-System.Reflection, linkable-framework
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fix illegal IR created by GetElement/ToScalar lowering #91874
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Allow using VS to run host tests when libraries use different config #91873
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [release/8.0] Don't log warnings for certain RemoveAttributeInstances #91866
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • dumpwriterelf: increase buffer to fit a RHEL8 arm64 page. #91865
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/8.0] JIT: ensure AVX512 ternary operands aren't used twice #91883
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Improve perf of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #91881
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: DNER multiregs with SIMD12 #91878
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Check DotNetFinalVersionKind when setting WorkloadVersionSuffix #91791
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] [maccatalyst] Make sure MacProxy is included in System.Net.Http #91599
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix Dispose and SendData Race on Http3 Test #91690
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Add Native AOT Pri0 test leg #91373
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix implementation of NegotiateAuthentication.Wrap for Kerberos on Windows #91311
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, regression-from-last-release, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] [maccatalyst] Make sure MacProxy is included in System.Net.Http #91817
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [CI][Android] Fix android tests exclusions #91892
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fix case where we illegally optimize away a memory barrier on ARM32 #91870
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fix invalid zero-init suppression for untracked variables #91840
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Handle mistyped commas in morph in pre-order too #91718
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Emit less metadata for not-reflection-visible types #91703
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Cleanup defines for specialized handle types #91847
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix SearchValues<string>.Contains issue if one value is a prefix of all the others #91887
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix illegal operand swapping in VectorXYZ.AndNot transformation #91882
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Remove DebugProxy from ClaimsIdentity and ClaimsPrincipal #91680
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • [6.0] Fix session-local named mutex compat issue #90344
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.22
  • [release/7.0-staging] [hot_reload] ignore modified MONO_TABLE_TYPEDEF rows in update #90172
    Servicing-approved, area-EnC-mono, 7.0.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #91436
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #91435
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.x
  • Enable rule CA1869 - Cache and reuse 'JsonSerializerOptions' #90895
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Improve binder gen binding logic (init, member binding, polymorphism) #91717
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Reduce work done by RuntimeHelpers.TryGetHashCode on Mono #91516
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution
  • Make `BundlerConsistencyTests` stop building/copying self-contained project unnecessarily #91829
    test-enhancement, area-Single-File
  • NativeAOT runtime PAL cleanup #91831
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: ensure AVX512 ternary operands aren't used twice #91851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Work around WASI's mmap implementation not returning aligned m… #91761
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Improve perf of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #91290
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [browser] [wasm] Remove manual ThrowIfCancellationRequested from ReadAsync response streaming #91834
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [Mono][WASM][Test] Unblock JIT/SIMD/Vector3Interop_r/Vector3Interop_r.sh #91786
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: DNER multiregs with SIMD12s #91674
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix case where we illegally optimize away a memory barrier on ARM32 #91827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [main] [release/8.0] Do not set fetch depth on source-build #90705
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Remove uses of IlcTrimMetadata from the test tree #91774
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't log warnings for certain RemoveAttributeInstances #91782
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Add New Test to Track Number of Jitted Methods #91235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Delete the RequiresPreviewFeaturesAttribute from RefreshMemoryLimit #91688
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix `Item4` is missing in some `ValueTuple`s' `IStructuralEquatable.Equals` #91470
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Do not throw PNSE exception from NegotiateAuthentication constructor #91753
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Mark `SString`'s single argument ctors as `explicit` #91822
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix old gcc build #91845
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • BindConfiguration registers change token source with the right options name #91842
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix `Item4` is missing in some `ValueTuple`s' `IStructuralEquatable.Equals` #91471
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix `Item4` is missing in some `ValueTuple`s' `IStructuralEquatable.Equals` #91472
    area-System.Runtime, 6.0.x
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove CMake version checks #91632
    area-Infrastructure
  • [NOT READY] GC: Rearrange finalization queue to put freelist in middle #91029
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary rid argument to dotnet-restore #91844
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Store pinned static fields in the Pinned Object Heap. #89895
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
  • Check if loop body occured before loopTop and if so unmark alignment #91854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Do not OCSP staple invalid OCSP responses #90552
    area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.x
  • [browser][MT] enable all MT library tests on the runtime CI pipeline #91536
    arch-wasm, area-System.Threading, area-Build-mono
  • DNMD in Mono #91487
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Remove "Is supported on this TFM" logic from marshalling generators and instead handle it during factory construction #91768
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Fix stack overflow handling on Unix #89799
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Handle "successful error cases" in near differ on arm64 #91783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Issue 90788 improvments to System.Diagnostics.Stopwatch #90789
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • Use highest thread priority in linux #89848
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Don't link in debugger component in release mode. #91848
    area-Build-mono
  • Use `NativeMemory` in `System.Data.Odbc` #85966
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Add package readmes #91210
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • WIP: [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Dont' use bareword `bool` in icall sig macros #91808
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Fix handling of variant casting in the managed type system #91788
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Cleanup unused runtime functions #91681
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove public provider from rundown session #91383
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #90556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Fix WasmLinkIcalls and WasmNativeStrip support. #91843
    area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Using together with .NET 8 SDK #2235
  • Green Thread Experiment Results #2398

PullRequests

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Stop generating catch funclets #2399
  • Add Stream boilerplate source-generator and attribute #2185

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Reduce the complexity of dotnet tools by reducing the use of asset files #35283
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]With .NET8 preview RC2 installed on Loc OS, the string "description" is not localized in help text in CLI. #35269

Closed

  • [NETE2ESDK][Loc]With VS 17.7 preview 2 + net 8 preview 5, warning NETSDK1201 message is unlocalized when publishing net 7.0 project. #32595
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]With .NET 8 preview 5 SDK installed, the help description for "--sc, --self-contained" option is not consistent with EN. #32753
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]With .NET8 preview 5 installed on Loc OS, the options for artifacts-path are unlocalized after running "dotnet build --help" in CLI . #32955
    8.0.1xx
  • [NETSDKE2E][Loc]With .NET8 preview 7 installed on Loc OS, Some strings of welcome description are unlocalized in CLI. #33900
  • ```dotnet run``` should populate a DOTNET_LAUNCH_PROFILE environment variable #35027

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove SelfContained set to false for -a #35286
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Asp.Net FrameworkReference in BrowserRefresh #35282
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Msbuild.Test.Utilites build fix for VS #35281
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Fix redist.csproj build failure on SLN rebuild in VS #35280
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35275
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use MVC extensions from Razor transport #35273
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 21.1.1 in /eng/dependabot #35271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 21.1.1 in /eng/dependabot #35270
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Update .editorconfig template #35268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2264287 #35267
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Asp.Net FrameworkReference in BrowserRefresh #35190
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35251
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.1 to 13.0.3 #35253
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • Improve test logging, reliability #35265
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [Containers] Validate that user applications will run on the selected base image #35246
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [main] Update dotnet/runtime #35048
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Side by side workload manifests and garbage collection for file based installs #35106
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Use Razor with renamed compiler DLLs #34928
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Container Build: Add OCI Archive Format writing #35204
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Update Verify.Xunit package version #35146
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intellisense not suggesting extension methods from source generated code #69887
  • Alt+F1 for peek hints cannot be rebound to a different shortcut #69886
  • Do not open Intellisense on full-line deletion #69885
  • VS2022 Sync namespaces from solution explorer also makes other changes. #69884
  • When moving cs files under a new solution folder the automatic namespace adjustment changes the file indentation, does not respect system settings. #69883
  • c# IntelliSense override method has wrong signature. #69880
  • Fixer for IDE0251 results in poorly formatted code #69876

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34111.181 #69892
  • Classification is incorrect in a C# document #69881
  • Unnecessary (?) CS8907 when base record got property and derived record got same property as constructor parameter #66494
    C# 12.0
  • Source Generation silently crashes when using wrong compiler version #66681
    C# 12.0
  • Support inline arrays with collection literals #68927
    17.8
  • Test Plan for Instance Members in `nameof` #67565
    C# 12.0
  • [Question] Why DefaultVisit is public? #69879

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Revert "Use dictionary lookup while resolving assembly refere… #69891
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Minor tweaks to SG generation in the compilation tracker. #69889
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Lazily populate FileIdentifier fields #69882
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow Razor to format a new document it wants to create #69878
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Colorize unbound `partial` identifier as a keyword #69877
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Change commented-code priority to always beat semantic classification #69888
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix escaping and wrapping in vscode hover #69893
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize readonly list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #69802
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • EnC: Parameter and property analysis #69774
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: avoid intermediate List<T> if spread elements have known length #69875
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Implement find all references to preprocessing symbols #66425
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Replace InterceptorsPreview with InterceptorsPreviewNamespaces=global #69848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle long extension invocation chains #69831
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • Fix folding range bug in C# extension #69817
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize `T ?? null` to `T` where `T` is a reference type #69803
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Create a brokered service to delegate loading of projects to us #69857
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Nullable conversion of collection expressions #69852
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Fix issue with stale cached data in LSP pull diagnostics #69864
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support zstd Content-Encoding #50643
  • Perf regression: single_query #50639
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #50638
  • [Blazor] SSR security guidance docs #50637
    8.0
  • Clarify the names of the interactive render modes for Blazor and rationalize with the component tag helper #50636
  • Improve CodeCheck.ps1 experience for API changes during RCs #50635
    .NET 9 Planning
  • WebApplicationFactory disposes host before StopAsync on background service is called #50622

Closed

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.Abstractions and Microsoft.AspNetCore.App marked as deprecated #50641
  • Synchronous operations are disallowed. Call WriteAsync or set AllowSynchronousIO to true instead with long html #50640
  • Security review for full stack web UI with Blazor #46396
    8.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Startup APIs API review #49754
    8.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Component application discovery APIs #49756
    8.0-rc2
  • API review: Razor MapRazorComponents #47312
    8.0-rc2
  • HttpRequestHeaders Keys.Contains is not case insensitive, whereas HttpDictionary is #50553
    9.0-preview1
  • InputFile in Blazor SSR #50614
  • CSS loading issue in Blazor Server app when Changing environment variable to "Production" #50595
  • Easy WASM and Web Component modules for Blazor Web #50615
  • API and Blazor template missing tags #49215
    8.0-rc2
  • Should this property be removed or marked as Obsolete? #50043
    8.0-rc2
  • Improve perf of forms by caching lambda expression compilation #50376
    8.0-rc2
  • NRE when binding to an array with SupplyParametersFromForm #49744
    8.0-rc2
  • [Blazor] Configure detailed errors for Razor component endpoints #49468
    8.0-rc2
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #50601
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #50611
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #50610
  • Perf improvement: json #50618
  • Perf regression: json #50619

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK version #50644
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #50624
    area-networking

Merged

  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Delay component activation until the initial page loads completely #50345
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Update Microsoft.IdentityModel to 7.0.0 #50632
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc2
  • Split redis output-cache pieces from Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchange.Redis into Microsoft.AspNetCore.OutputCaching.StackExchangeRedis #50457

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to disable debug messages logged to the Debug console #31694
  • EFCore Design v7 Package Requires Net7 System Libraries #31691
  • When using an `IModelFinalizingConvention` to add a shadow entity to the model, scripting migrations generates duplicate create table statements. #31689
  • Complex request with external list and "except" or "all" operator could not be translated #31684
  • Typed Ids: HasOne WithMany raises NullReferenceException #31683
  • Translate to NULLIF #31682
  • Translate to GREATEST/LEAST in relational #31681

Closed

  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design v7 Is Not Net6 Compatible #31685

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK version #31693
  • WIP #31692
  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.45.0 to 2.57.0 #31688
    blocked, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.2.2 to 8.2.3 #31687
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31690
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Separate element type from primitive collection #31677

Updated

  • Better handling of nullable element comparers #31672
  • stackalloc for BytesToDecimal #31190
    community-contribution
  • Model validation for primitive collections #31680
